item.title: #en @ 1475969573157580808
item.description: The World Bank found that 97 million people worldwide fell into poverty as a direct impact of 2020 pandemic policies, and many live on only $2 per day. https://t.co/1woFjdyXnx via @worldbank

item.title: #en @ 1475930531388960772
item.description: The mission at GET Protocol is to be the Open Data Standard for ticketing. Part of that mission is to provide transparent on-chain economic and ticketing data for tickets. For example, you can see tickets sold live in the NFT Ticket Explorer https://t.co/1ahfev5oHb 11/30
